t: Racing Simulator Software - AWS DeepRacer - AWS
s: Developers of all skill levels can get hands on with machine learning through a cloud-based 3D racing simulator and a fully autonomous 1/18th scale race car driven by reinforcement learning. ... Celebrating the final AWS DeepRacer League championship and road ahead.

t: Amazon Wants You to Code the AI Brain for This Little Car | WIRED
s: November 28, 2018 - The car comes with an HD camera, a dual-core Intel processor, and other hardware it needs to pilot itself—but a blank slate where its driving skills should be. Programmers must help it learn those, using new Amazon tools to support reinforcement-learning projects. A DeepRacer vehicle on a track at Amazon's conference in Las Vegas. Matt Wood · “This is a technology that has been almost completely out of reach to all but the most well funded ...

t: DeepRacer: Will Amazon's own programmable toy car interest you in AI? | ZDNET
s: January 21, 2019 - It's the type of toy you might have had dreams about as a child, or perhaps last night: A little race car you can teach to drive itself. What you might need to learn first about DeepRacer is quite a hill for anyone to climb.

t: amazon launches self-driving toy car and a brand new competitive sports
s: November 29, 2018 - amazon web services is launching a self-driving toy car that hopes to encourage a community of developers interested in machine learning. the AWS deepracer, a radio-controlled, four-wheel drive, is trained using reinforcement learning, a form of AI which means it will learn to drive better ...

t: Amazon.com: Hot Wheels Ai Starter Set Street Racing Edition : Toys & Games
s: Customers find the toy vehicle set fun for all ages and reasonably fast at expert level, though cars go very slow on beginner mode. The track is big but takes up enormous space, and while some say it's worth the price, others consider it not worth the cost. Assembly is difficult, and cars don't ...

t: Amazon.com: AI Racing Robot Kit Donkey Car Starter Kit Powered by Jetson Nano Deep Learning Self Driving Platform for Small Scale Cars Jetson Nano AI Smart Robot Car(Upgraded Version) : Toys & Games
s: [DONKEY CAR] This car is an open source DIY self-driving platform, focusing on providing enthusiasts and students with high-speed experiments and deep learning Tensorflower, object detection and autonomous driving, and is designed to create possible self-supporting AI for enthusiasts and students.

t: Amazon is releasing a $400 self-driving toy car that you can program yourself – and it's launching a racing league to test your skills
s: December 1, 2018 - Andy Jassy, CEO of Amazon Web Services, announced AWS DeepRacer: A remote controlled car, retailing for $400 when it becomes available next year, that developers can program to drive itself. This car is now available to pre-order on Amazon at a special introductory price of $249.

t: Will Amazon's own programmable toy car interest you in AI?
s: November 18, 2022 - We turn your data into clear insights so you can make smarter decisions. By processing raw data and building intuitive dashboards, we help you unlock the full potential of your data, leveraging privacy-safe solutions in a cookieless environment.

t: AWS expands DeepRacer league, announces car updates | TechCrunch
s: December 3, 2019 - Last year at AWS re:invent, the company’s massive customer conference, Amazon launched a new miniature race car and a racing league, all designed to teach developers about machine learning in a fun way.

s: 2 weeks ago - Unlock your artificial intelligence skills and career potential with deep dive AI courses, trainings and certification. Gain experience with generative AI.

t: Car Dealership Disturbed When Its AI Is Caught Offering Chevys for $1 Each
s: December 21, 2023 - The Chevy of Watsonville car dealership probably didn't expect its AI chatbot to start pawning off its brand new SUVs for a song.

t: Amazon.com: Amazon Autos
s: Find your next new car at Amazon Autos. Browse, trade-in, and get financing online for Hyundai vehicles at Amazon Autos.

t: Hyundai Vehicles Available to "Add to Cart" on Amazon Autos
s: January 7, 2025 - Additional dealer participation, markets and functionalities will continue to roll out throughout the year. ... You can now buy a Hyundai at Amazon. You read that right. Now you can buy a Hyundai the same place where you buy dinosaur balloons and roller skates, all from the comfort of your home. And the best part? You won’t even have to break down a car...

t: Zoox: It's Not a Car | Zoox
s: Zoox is a purpose-built autonomous vehicle designed for riders, not drivers. Learn more about the Zoox robotaxi and the future of ride-hailing.

t: Amazon and Stellantis' Big Plan to Revolutionize In-Car Tech Is Dead
s: 5 days ago - Amazon's SmartCockpit was meant to leverage AI to plan trips, coach off-roaders on trails and, naturally, sell subscriptions. Now, the tech giant and Stellantis have called off their partnership.

t: Amazon is acquiring self-driving car startup Zoox | The Verge
s: June 26, 2020 - This will not be the first investment Amazon has made in self-driving car technology. Last year the eCommerce giant took part in a funding round for Aurora Innovation, an autonomous tech startup helmed by the former head of Google’s self-driving car project.

t: Amazon debuts a scale model autonomous car to teach developers machine learning | TechCrunch
